questions.question: A rectangular plate is 3.4 m wide and 5 m deep lies in a water making an angle of 31° with the free water surface. If h is 1.7 m, Find the position of the total pressure force. Refer figure in the simulator.
A rectangular plate is 3.2 m wide and 4 m deep lies in a water making an angle of 43° with the free water surface. If h is 1.8 m, Find the position of the total pressure force.
